c74object.name: pdm.midiplayer~

attribute.name: defaultnote
attribute.digest: Sets the default MIDI note value. When a nonzero signal to the second inlet, this value is ignored.

attribute.name: defaultvel
attribute.digest: Sets the default MIDI velocity value. When a nonzero signal to the third inlet, this value is ignored.

attribute.name: defaultdur
attribute.digest: Sets the default note duration. When a nonzero signal to the fourth inlet, this value is ignored.

attribute.name: channel
attribute.digest: MIDI channel to transmit messages over.

c74object.description: pdm.midiplayer~ accepts signals representing MIDI note, velocity, a note duration to form MIDI notes. Notes are sent in response to a impulse sent to the first inlet. This object is similar to mc.midiplayer~, but it sends standard MIDI messages and handles polyphony more simply.
c74object.digest: MIDI note generator for signal-based sequencers.
